title: The Best Cheap Phones for Almost Every Budget
content: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These Android devices and iPhones stood up to WIRED’s testing—and they all range from $150 to $500.
description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These Android devices and iPhones stood up to WIRED’s testing—and they all range from $150 to $500.
